items.content_html: A Meteor library to make file uploading and managing as easy as possible. It offers a consistent and resilient file storage strategy, relying on busboy, mongodb and gridFS. The files are stored in MongoDB. The package is very lightweight (~25kB minified) and has only busboy as direct dependency.
items.title: jonisapp/meteor-mongo-files: A Meteor library to make file uploading and managing as easy as possible. It offers a consistent and resilient file storage strategy, relying on busboy, mongodb and gridFS. The files are stored in MongoDB. The package is very lightweight (~25kB minified) and has only busboy as direct dependency.
